hadiths.text: Jabir b. Abdullah (Allah be pleased with them) reported that when Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) proceeded to Mecca, he came to it (the Black Stone). he kissed it. and moved to his right. and moved quickly in three circuits, and walked in four circuits

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ عَرَفَةَ كُلَّهَا مَوْقِفٌ
chapter.eng-name: All of Arafat is a place of standing
